title: Perdomo Party!
itunes:title: Perdomo Party!
description: Fresh off the celebration of his 25th Anniversary party, Dave welcomes in special guest Nick Perdomo, owner, founder and President of Tabacalera Perdomo, to the Cigar Authority. It's all about Nick Perdomo on today's show, along with Perdomo's latest news and developments. Gentleman, don't touch that dial. It's time for the finer things in life. It's time for The Cigar Authority!
